text: Sandberg is a municipality in Rhön-Grabfeld in Bavaria in Germany. == Geography == === Place === Sandberg is within the Main-Rhön regional planning region. === Subdivisions === Sandberg is divided into nine municipal subdivisions or villages:http://www.bayerische-landesbibliothek- online.de/orte/ortssuche_action.html?anzeige=voll&modus;=automat&tempus;=+20111121/181910&attr;=OBJ&val;=1610 * Altmühle * Kilianshof * Langenleiten * Neumühle * Sandberg * Schmalwasser * Simonshöfe * Waldberg * Ziegelhütte ==References== Category:Rhön-Grabfeld
title: Sandberg, Bavaria
